snippet: Chris Kirk and Briny Baird made birdies on the 18th hole to separate themselves from the pack at the McGladrey Classic on St. Simons Island, Ga.
abstract: Chris Kirk and Briny Baird share third-round lead at the McGladrey Classic on St Simons Island, Ga; other golf new noted.
lead_paragraph: Chris Kirk and Briny Baird made birdies on the 18th hole to separate themselves from the pack at the McGladrey Classic on St. Simons Island, Ga.
